It is with deep regret that I must inform you that our friend Kenny Young is no longer physically with us. He passed away due to leukemia on January 31, 2005.

We are continuing his work in his name and will keep his site as active and updated as possible at this archival address, https://kenny.anomalyresponse.com. If you have any contributions to make to any of the pages of this website or any of Kenny's other publications or productions, please .
